, AA.ItemName , AA.InfoNoticeID , AA.UseYn , AA.SortOrder
FROM dbo.BGInfoNoticeItem AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.InfoNoticeID = #InfoNoticeID# ORDER BY RowNo

statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.BGInfoNoticeItem ( CreateDate, CreateBy, CreateByName, ItemName, InfoNoticeID, UseYn, SortOrder ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreateBy#, #CreateByName#, #ItemName#, #InfoNoticeID#, #UseYn#, #SortOrder# )
